title: [FINISHED!] Let's duel and see who's the real Captain of the Bridge!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/lwIuBNU.jpg

***Player Support - 2 / Community - 3***

COMMUNITY WINS!!!!

Hey all,

Thanks for the great games and for watching!  We are super happy to play with everyone, and we hope to do this again soon!  If you have any feedback, be sure to let us know!

Until next time!

------------------------------------------------------------

***GAME 5 END***

http://i.imgur.com/bfILTp0.png

The Captain in this game was....***InsaneDemon*** {{champion:37}}    The Silent Captain, but can still give orders! :D

------------------------------------------------------

***GAME 4 END***

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

The Captain in this game was....***1024Miguel*** {{champion:222}}    ....I'm not sure what kind of captain she would make...I know I would be scared though!

--------------------------------------------------------

***GAME 3 END***

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

The Captain in this game was....***AfroWalrus*** {{champion:223}}   A gentleman makes the best captain!

-----------------------------------------------------

***Game 2 END***

http://i.imgur.com/bfILTp0.png

The Captain in this game was....***mgcgamer*** {{champion:161}}  With a captain looking like that, you would never question those orders!

-------------------------------------------------------

***GAME 1 END***

http://i.imgur.com/bfILTp0.png

The Captain in this game was....***Wuks*** {{champion:6}}  for raining death from above!  Gangplank would be proud!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Ahoy scallywags!

It’s been awhile since our last encounter and we figured it’s high time that we challenge the community to some cutthroat, winner-takes-all, games!  With the recent Bilgewater event going on, we want these matches to take part on Butcher's Bridge. We’re looking forward to discovering who deserves the title of Captain and who has what it takes to control the high seas!

We’re planning on setting sail tomorrow, ***July 24th, from 3:00pm – 6:00pm PDT!*** As with our previous meetup, we’ll continue to stream these games for everyone’s viewing enjoyment.

[Here's the link to the stream!](http://www.twitch.tv/RiotSupport)

In-between games, we’ll be updating this discussion with the Lobby Name and Password. Once its filled, the game will start!

replies.body:
It's nice to see proof Riot Games cares about its players' health so much they they're willing to pelt them with oranges to prevent scurvy. See you on the Bridge, you landlubbers!

PS. Do the poro rats explode when fed enough poro snax? Come to think of it, are they even called poros at all?

Actually they're just wharf rats, haha...TIL

Oh...and...http://i.imgur.com/pwoVZdi.jpg
I was the Sona on the fifth game :D {{champion:37}}
Thanks for the game. Any game I can Ramram is a good game.
Ok.

Hey Riot,

Thanks for the game! I had a blast on my first time {{champion:6}} ! :D
Thanks for playing! :D

1st time urgot OP!

Congratz on being the Captain! :D

This would be a great event if almost half the league community wasn't having problems with crashing and red shop screens.
Edit: Rito has fixed it
We have actually released a hotfix for the Mac crashes!  It should resolve the Red background in the shop, as well as stop the game from freezing/crashing.
This was really fun! Thanks for hosting this guys!

No problem!  Great plays! :D  We all learned A LOT about Mr. Tahm haha

Thanks for joining in and playing!
Just be sure not to hop into SoloQ with my crazy ARAM Tahm build or you'll be demoted to River Squire.

I love that you guys are doing this and hope to see more in the future. Only complaint is that I'm stuck at work and won't get home until after 6 so I can't try to play. But it's not Riot's fault I have to work. Maybe in the future you can do games on a week day and maybe a weekend day for a few hours? :D
uh how can i join ?
Once we get closer to 3pm PDT, I will update the thread with the Lobby Name and Password!
how does this work

Come tomorrow at 3pm PDT, we will update this thread with a Lobby Name and Password.  Once you join, you will have an opportunity to play some Butcher's Bridge games with Rioters from Player Support!  We have to see who the real Captain of the bridge is :D
Holy **** this guys name. I'd say he needs to be at least Diamond to live up to the name but lets be honest Porthos was the real carry of that team.
There was no true carry, all pulled their weight.  Remember, all for one, one for all!
lol ya I was just trying to pick fun at the name but it's hard with such an awesome character
:-) sounds like fun

Er, any chance of you hosting the same thing on Saturday, PDT?
There's a high likelihood of me being online from like 8AM-6PM PDT ^_^

But I doubt my chances of making it into the Friday ones


Side note:

Please buff Galios mana regen rate. Oh god it's so bad it's painful. XD I'm actually considering full MP5 glyphs, seals, and Quiscients..... just so I don't have to build the grail.

Did I mention that he scales better with MP than AP? And I can't build MP due to grail? :<
It can be hard to wrangle everyone into games over the weekend, people spending time with their SO's, adventuring, etc.  But we should continue to host community games like this in the future :)

Aw, well I hope it works out for this Saturday ^_^

I just find it sad that you guys only reply to posts like this, and anything vital seems to be shoved "under the rug".

:<
Tomorrows my birthday! It would be great to be able to celebrate it with some Rioter games :)
Happy (early) Birthday!  We'll be playing for a while, so hopefully you'll be able to join us for one of the game!  :)
Anything like this going to happen on EUW this time?

Currently, this is only a North American event >.<

We will be playing mainly ARAM, so if you have an NA account, feel free to sign in and join in! :)

Game 3 was fun. I'm a pretty bad player and I haven't played {{champion:86}} in a while, so I made some bad calls but I did my best. Our ADC disconnected but it was fun having my game streamed. Ty Riot support!
Don't undersell yourself, the Garen worked out c:. Had a fun time playin' with ya!
TY so much. Means a lot coming from a plat, seeing as i'm a lowly bronze lol
Believe it or not, there isn't too much of a difference between you and I. If you ever want tips or help or anything feel free to add me on League, I'd be more than happy.

I'm glad that you still had a lot of fun! ^.^

And don't worry, your Garen wasn't bad at all!
Aww, ty!
Ty for the event. I was Kassadin from game 4

Thank you to everyone that hung out in the Twitch Chat with me. It was super fun and there were some awesome games today! 

Great job Community!

In case I cant mention it enough 

http://www.reignofgaming.net/forums/league-of-legends/the-art-of-league/41265-comic-syndra-x-zed

tee hee, newest chapter is adorable
Sorry my computer blue screened in game 3
It's ok!  What's important is that you tried to come back and finish the game :)
WOW that was fun. We were both so tanky! O_O GG GUYS!
This is a great concept. Hopefully I can join the next game!

{{champion:44}} -Game 1

Fun game Riot PS :D Sorry for the double Xpeke

GG WP, Fun game .
Tank Vs squish with a legendary finish by a {{champion:44}} {{champion:5}}  Xpeke .
Rito pls
1 hour hype
Catch ya on the Bridge ye pox-ridden curs
For some reason, I want to watch a few matches of diamond level rioters vs bronze players.

Ohhhhhhhhh...I NEED THIS.

######I need this...
Oh good! Hope to see everyone there!
